== Introduction ==

We are preparing Kubuntu Impish Indri (21.10) for release in  <nowiki>[[https://discourse.ubuntu.com/t/impish-indri-release-schedule/18540 | October, 2021]]</nowiki>. With this '''Beta''' pre-release, you can see what we are testing in preparation for our next version.

'''NOTE:''' 

This is Beta Release. 
Kubuntu '''Beta Releases''' are '''NOT''' recommended for:
* Regular users who are not aware of pre-release issues
* Anyone who needs a stable system
* Anyone uncomfortable running a possibly frequently broken system
* Anyone in a production environment with data or workflows that need to be reliable

Kubuntu Beta Releases are recommended for:
* Regular users who want to help us test by finding, reporting, and/or fixing bugs
* Kubuntu, KDE, and Qt developers

Please '''report your installation results''' on the <nowiki>[[http://iso.qa.ubuntu.com/qatracker|Release tracker]]</nowiki>.

General bug reporting guidelines can be found here: ReportingBugs

For Kubuntu, Ubuntu, and other flavours you can also take part in the testing week for the Beta. <nowiki>[[https://discourse.ubuntu.com/t/ubuntu-21-10-testing-week/24362|LINK HERE for info]]</nowiki>.

== Getting Kubuntu 21.10 Beta ==

=== Upgrading from 21.04 ===

To upgrade to a Kubuntu 21.10 pre-release, run '''sudo do-release-upgrade -d''' from a command line.

=== Download a Disk Image ===

Download a <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/kubuntu/releases/21.10/beta/|Bootable image]]</nowiki>. Direct downloads, torrents, and zysnc are available as options.

== New features and changes in 21.10 Beta ==
=== Core desktop and applications ===

==== Plasma 5.22: simple by default, powerful when needed ====

<nowiki>[[File:ImpishPlasma.png||width=800]]</nowiki>

<nowiki>[[https://kde.org/announcements/plasma/5/5.22.0/|Plasma 5.22]]</nowiki> has been developed to make it smoother to use while retaining the familiar setup.

Kubuntu 21.10 Beta ships the 5th scheduled bugfix release of 5.22 (5.22.5), as will the final release.

==== KDE Apps updates, including KDE Gear 21.08 and other updated apps ====

<nowiki>[[File:ImpishApps.png||width=800]]</nowiki>

==== Web browser and office suite ====

* <nowiki>[[https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/92.0/releasenotes//|Firefox 92]]</nowiki> is the default browser, using the native debian (.deb) package from the Ubuntu archive.
* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.documentfoundation.org/ReleaseNotes/7.2|LibreOffice 7.2.1]]</nowiki> is provided by default in the full installation.

==== Qt ====

Kubuntu 21.10 Beta ships with Qt 5.15.2

=== Other new and updated applications in the Ubuntu archive ===

* Latte-dock is updated to the new <nowiki>[[https://psifidotos.blogspot.com/2021/08/latte-dock-v0100-official-stable-release.html | 0.10 with many new features and improvements]]</nowiki>.
* Krita is now at the latest bugfix release 4.4.8

== Other highlights/notes ==

=== Plasma Wayland session ===

* A Plasma Wayland session is installed, but is not the default. A Wayland session can be started by selecting it at the login screen.
